pkgmetadata.longdescription: R2 Measure of Explained Variation under the Additive Hazards Model // R^2 measure of explained variation under the semiparametric additive hazards model is estimated. The measure can be used as a measure of predictive capability and therefore it can be adopted in model selection process. Rava, D. and Xu, R. (2020) arXiv:2003.09460.
